lore: When this creature's mace hits the body of its enemies, the opaque sphere on its head absorbs all light around it. For a moment, darkness falls and uncertainty reigns. The Moon Crusader is a warrior of light who travels the world in search of forgotten magic that continues to overflow and could cause disasters. Using the power of its two spheres, it can absorb this energy and contain the magic items that emit it... or simply destroy them with its incredible strength.
menagerieDialog: (It appears to be sleeping, but everyone knows that Crusaders never sleep.)
(It appears to be uncharacteristically restless. It has probably spent too long cooped up in your castle.)
(Though this creature may appear to be simple-minded, you know it has great ambitions. Hopefully they align with your own.)
(Only this creature's unbreakable loyalty toward you prohibits it from wreaking havoc on your entire kingdom.)
(It's busy fidgeting with its maul in a rare display of unease.)
name: Moon Crusader
